name: Build a ZK circuit in Halo2 - the easy way
description:
Learn how to build a ZK circuit in Halo2 using our opinionated halo2-lib framework. We will provide documentation, scaffolding, and tooling as well as personal guidance.

Come with your project ideas or try one of our suggestions!

Audience:
ZK application developers who are looking for an easy-to-use Plonkish framework to build performant applications.
